Package com.ibm.streamsx.dl

This package provides distributed locking functions which can be used for safe, concurrent access to distributed stores from multiple threads and processes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Lock
    This is an interface defining the available distributed lock (dl) methods.
    LockFactory  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DistributedLocks
    This is the main entry point into the locking API, used to create a LockFactory.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LockException
    Any errors during distribute lock (dl) operation will result in this exception getting thrown.
    LockFactoryException
    Any errors during lock creation will result in this exception getting thrown.

Package com.ibm.streamsx.dl Description

This package provides distributed locking functions which can be used for safe, concurrent access to distributed stores from multiple threads and processes. This is achieved using a trust based cooperative locking scheme to gain exclusive access into the stores for performing a set of transaction based store activities. The main class is a Lock. Use the DistributedLocks class which provides access to a LockFactory, from which Lock objects can be created. Each Lock has methods for acquiring and releasing it.
